pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Improved saving, pop-up flow, and palette buttons

content.raw: I'll take a look at these bugs (building_template_model should not be showing up)... just to clarify, how should the building editor treat models that exist in the main window that are outside of the building being edited? How should it treat buildings that were made in a previous session?
